name: Blue New York City ROBLOX Theme
description: This is my first ever theme, so sorry if it is a bit buggy. I used blurs and other techniques to make a unique design for it c: hope you like it
additional_info:
v3 - Discontinued. Disfunctional and too much to deal with. Hopefully you learned something from the source code! For blurs, use filter: blur(10px) or backdrop-filter: blur(10px) for a background. Thank you!

v2 - Transparent topbar + games page support

v1 - Release
